faq.question: What is iumProject, and what kind of services do you offer?
faq.answer: iumProject is a sales team that provides creative content to the minecraft world. We produce high-quality setups, configs, web solutions, and other custom content to enhance in-game experiences.

faq.question: How can I place an order?
faq.answer: To place an order, please contact us via Discord. You can submit your project ideas and requests, and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

faq.question: Which gaming platforms do your content adapt to?
faq.answer: Our content is typically tailored to popular gaming platforms like BuiltByBit, PolyMart and SpigotMc. However, if you have specific requirements, we can discuss creating content for other platforms as well.

faq.question: Do you work on custom projects or requests?
faq.answer: Yes, we are open to custom projects and requests. We are happy to create content tailored to your specific needs. Please feel free to contact us for more information via Discord.

products.name: Loby Setup
products.description: A lobby setup is a place where players can gather before entering the game. It is the first place players see when they join the server. A lobby setup is a great way to make a good first impression on your players. It is also a great way to showcase your server's features and attract new players.
